description: The Rev. Ricardo Flippin and other veterans received substandard prostate cancer treatments at the veterans' hospital in Philadelphia, where federal officials failed to detect a pattern of poor care.
title: Bad Seeds at the V.A.
title_page: Bad Seeds at the V.A. - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The Rev. Ricardo Flippin and other veterans received substandard prostate cancer treatments at the veterans' hospital in Philadelphia, where federal officials failed to detect a pattern of poor care.
